text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 13 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Mahiedine Mekhissi- Benabbad ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Ildar Minshin ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Balázs Ott ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
